name: Microsoft Outlook
natural_language_description: 这是 Microsoft Outlook 节点。主要用于: Consume Microsoft Outlook API

oldVersionNotice.displayName: New node version available: get the latest version with added features from the nodes panel.
oldVersionNotice.name: oldVersionNotice
oldVersionNotice.natural_language_description: 参数名: New node version available: get the latest version with added features from the nodes panel.

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: message
available_options: Draft (值: draft)
Folder (值: folder)
Folder Message (值: folderMessage)
Message (值: message)
Message Attachment (值: messageAttachment)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: create
available_options: Get Many (值: getAll) - Get many messages in a folder

messageId.name: messageId
messageId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Message ID | (必填项)

subject.name: subject
subject.natural_language_description: 参数名: Subject | 作用: The subject of the message

bodyContent.name: bodyContent
bodyContent.natural_language_description: 参数名: Body Content | 作用: Message body content

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: dataPropertyAttachmentsPrefixName (值: None) - Prefix for name of the binary property to which to write the attachments. An index starting with 0 will be added. So if name is "attachment_" the first attachment is saved to "attachment_0"
fields (值: None) - Fields the response will contain. Multiple can be added separated by comma.
filter (值: None) - Microsoft Graph API OData $filter query. Information about the syntax can be found here.

replyType.name: replyType
replyType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Reply Type | 默认值: reply | (必填项)
available_options: Reply (值: reply)
Reply All (值: replyAll)

comment.name: comment
comment.description: A comment to include. Can be an empty string.
comment.natural_language_description: 参数名: Comment | 作用: A comment to include. Can be an empty string.

send.name: send
send.description: Whether to send the reply message directly. If not set, it will be saved as draft.
send.natural_language_description: 参数名: Send | 作用: Whether to send the reply message directly. If not set, it will be saved as draft. | 默认值: True

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 100

toRecipients.name: toRecipients
toRecipients.description: Email addresses of recipients. Multiple can be added separated by comma.
toRecipients.natural_language_description: 参数名: Recipients | 作用: Email addresses of recipients. Multiple can be added separated by comma. | (必填项)

binaryPropertyName.name: binaryPropertyName
binaryPropertyName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Put Output File in Field | 提示: The name of the output binary field to put the file in | 默认值: data | (必填项)

folderId.name: folderId
folderId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Folder ID | (必填项)

attachmentId.name: attachmentId
attachmentId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Attachment ID | (必填项)

folderType.name: folderType
folderType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Type | 作用: Folder Type | 默认值: folder
available_options: Folder (值: folder)
Search Folder (值: searchFolder)

displayName.name: displayName
displayName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Display Name | 作用: Name of the folder | (必填项)

includeNestedFolders.name: includeNestedFolders
includeNestedFolders.description: Whether to include child folders in the search
includeNestedFolders.natural_language_description: 参数名: Include Nested Folders | 作用: Whether to include child folders in the search | 默认值: False

sourceFolderIds.name: sourceFolderIds
sourceFolderIds.description: The mailbox folders that should be mined
sourceFolderIds.natural_language_description: 参数名: Source Folder IDs | 作用: The mailbox folders that should be mined | 默认值: []

filterQuery.name: filterQuery
filterQuery.description: The OData query to filter the messages
filterQuery.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filter Query | 作用: The OData query to filter the messages | (必填项)

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: bccRecipients (值: None) - Email addresses of BCC recipients
bodyContent (值: None) - Message body content
bodyContentType (值: None) - Message body content type
categories (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression
ccRecipients (值: None) - Email addresses of CC recipients
internetMessageHeaders (值: None)
from (值: None) - The owner of the mailbox which the message is sent. Must correspond to the actual mailbox used.
importance (值: None) - The importance of the message
isRead (值: None) - Whether the message has been read
isReadReceiptRequested (值: None) - Whether a read receipt is requested for the message
toRecipients (值: None) - Email addresses of recipients. Multiple can be added separated by comma.
replyTo (值: None) - Email addresses to use when replying
subject (值: None) - The subject of the message
